data.title: good food
data.text:
there were 4 of us for dinner.. EVERYTHING we ordered was Good
good wine and scotch selection ...also other trendy drinks.
staff was friendly....  clean...... it was a little noisy but in all fairness they had a group in for Breast canner Awareness...really did not bother us!
I would recommend reservations.... we had reservations and they seated us right away!

data.title: Pricey but good
data.text: Haven't made it to the Sunday Brunch yet but have stopped in for appetizers and for lunch.  Good food and great atmosphere

data.title: Creative Cocktails and Cuisine in Lake Charles
data.text: Located in downtown Lake Charles, 1910 is a great place to visit for exceptional food and drink. For my most recent visit, my wife and I joined another couple for drinks and dinner. We opened with a few cocktails and a scotch from the fantastic selection they carry. Our appetizers were the Pork Cheeks, a must have, and a special for the evening, broiled oysters with shallots in Parmesan and gruyere. Entrees included seared scallops and steaks, both a ribeye and a filet. Everything was cooked to perfection and a delight to consume. After dinner we sampled some local bourbon and a new scotch just added to their extensive scotch, beer, and bourbon menu with the chef/owner. 1910 is one of ur favorite places for a fine meal in Lake Charles, Louisiana.

data.title: Disappointed
data.text: We had high hopes for 1910. The restaurant has a nice location. We were able to watch sunset across the lake from our table. The decor of 1910 was nice with locale photography on the walls. Zach our water did a nice job and offered suggestions. However, the food was a little underwhelming. Both of our salads where bland. My pork loin was so-so. My wife's Mahi was decent but did taste a bit strong. Her green beans, had a fancy name, was probably the highlight of the meal as my asparagus was boring as well. So even though I'm disappointed, it may have been an off night, and I would try them again. I was hoping for so much more.

data.title: 1910 is a winner!
data.text: Great place for lunch or drinks! ...took my better half there for a birthday late lunch. We both enjoyed fabulous meals. Good whiskey selection too! And our waitress' service was outstanding! The prices were very reasonable. Our meal experience would have been almost twice as much back in Dallas.

data.title: Great food and ambience
data.text: Downtown Lake Charles is a new must see!   Such a great location combined,with outstanding food.   Not to be missed by anyone!

data.title: 1910 restaurant Lake Charles
data.text: lovely place for lunch or dinner.. nice atmosphere. but small- recommend reservations ... the  food is very good  - the pasta  was delicious - and so were the scallops.nice place to go for drinks and appetizers also... also one of the few places in Lake Charles with an outdoor patio- small but very nice .

data.title: I can't stop going
data.text: Delicious everything.  Cocktails, wine, Apps, salads, entrées - had almost everything. Hands down best wine selection and steak in town. I often have a salad and its consistently fresh and fantastic. If we go later at night, we just eat at the bar with a couple glasses of wine or cocktails. Swanky.

data.title: Excellent
data.text:
We've eaten at this
gem located in the historic downtown Lake Charles for
brunch, lunch, and dinner. Best steak I've ever eaten. Anywhere. Potatoes Au Gratin are awesome! Try these appetizers - asparagus, gumbo croquettes, pork cheeks - you'll be happy. Lunch for me is a cherry feta hamburger or fried green tomato shrimp poboy or 1910 salad with tuna filet. Brunch is everything. Wine list is endless. It's a wine bar so you wouldn't expect such great cocktails, but they've got that too! Love this place. Outside patio seating with a view of the historic Calcasieu Courthouse with its fantastic copper top!

data.title: One of the Best
data.text: Must be near the top for Lake Charles.  Decor is simple and could be improved with just a little touch of sophistication here and there.  Service friendly but still learning.  Elk filet was excellent, generous serving and nicely cooled.  Au gratin potatoes need some work--appear to have been prepared some time in advance and thus slightly brown in color.  Shrimp and grits very nice.  Rack of lamb was only disappointment--the balsamic vinegar marinade lingered on chops, not very pleasant.  Pasta Isabel very good.  Desserts were traditional but excellent:  cheese cake, chocolate cake and bread pudding.  Appetizer sautéed fois gras was minuscule and almost invisible.  Decent wine list.   All in all, a restaurant with promise.

data.title: Brunch
data.text: Very eclectic menu!  Wasn't my cup of tea!  A little too eclectic!   Prices for entrees was fine!   Wasn't impressed with way breakfast was cooked.   Scrambled eggs were undercooked, sausage patties were burnt on both sides, toast was basically warm bread, mimosas were not good at all!!   Bloody Mary's were ok, not great!   Drinks were way overpriced!  I've eaten at restaurants from west coast to east coast and this restaurant's prices for their drinks was too high!  More than likely won't go back!

data.title: Amazing dining experience!
data.text:
I have had the pleasure of dining at 1910 on several occasions.  The pork shoulder sandwich delivers an unbelievable burst of absolutely delicious flavor in every single bite. Cracklins, habanero pepper cheese, fried egg, & pickled onions, atop pulled pork shoulder..are you kidding me?!! This lunch menu item is definitely one of my lunch time favorites as well as the regular burger. The burger was juicy and flavorful!  I have to say that the Filet & Potatoes Au Gratin Entree is the best I have had, ever. Hands down, my favorite on the menu. The steak was tender, juicy, well seasoned, and grilled to perfection, & the potatoes are sinfully delicious!  Pasta Isabel, Shrimp & Grits, Crab Cakes, Gumbo Croquettes, Charcuterie Plate, as well as the Parmesan Asparagus are all excellent choices that we absolutely loved!  
The wine selection is over the top, the atmosphere is excellent, and the pricing is more than reasonable.  Then wait staff is attentive, friendly, & always accommodating. Andrew Green has created a dining experience that leaves you wanting more & looking very forward to your next visit. I highly recommend 1910 for any meal of the day, on any day of the week!!

data.title: Wow!
data.text: This restaurant is in the perfect spot in downtown Lake Charles. It's located on a historic corner with views of the Lake Charles Historic Courthouse and City Hall Cultural Center. The food has always been perfect. We've had it all - fish, steak, pasta, salad, appetizers, desserts for dinner as well as crawfish bisque, gumbo, and unique hamburgers for lunch. We have also been to Sunday brunch several times. What keeps us coming back - exellent hot fresh food, atmosphere, service, VAST selection of wines and cocktails. So happy to see this edition to downtown Lake Charles!

data.title: Great food and service with style
data.text: Delicious food  and you can't go wrong with any of their menu choices. Service was sophisticated and savvy, on par with that of much larger cities. They just opened a month ago and should be receiving many rave reviews. Hurry up and make reservations while you can still get in ahead of the crowds that are sure to come.

data.title: Excellent service, nice atmosphere
data.text: The restaurant is downtown in a quaint little area, small place but cozy atmosphere.  We were only going to have a glass of wine and maybe an appetizer so we chose to sit at the bar.  Our bartender Jim was great, he gave us a few suggestions from wine to appetizers to entrees.  We ended having the Don & Sons Pinot Noir (delicious) and then went with his suggestion of appetizers which were the Gumbo Croquettes and Pork Cheeks...our appetizers were so scrumptious that we decided to share an entrée...the Shrimp and Grits.   Nothing disappointed.  This is actually right here in our hometown but we felt like we were somewhere else.  A must visit if you are in our area.  Something different. Fine dining affordably.
